thread.title: 'Tampa Bay Lightning Preseason Special' premieres Oct. 3 on FOX Sports Sun
thread.title_full: 'Tampa Bay Lightning Preseason Special' premieres Oct. 3 on FOX Sports Sun

title: 'Tampa Bay Lightning Preseason Special' premieres Oct. 3 on FOX Sports Sun
text:
'Tampa Bay Lightning Preseason Special' premieres Oct. 3 on FOX Sports Sun 'Tampa Bay Lightning Preseason Special' provides a must-watch preview leading up to opening night. By FOX Sports Sun Oct 2, 2015 at 12:00p ET 0Shares 
TAMPA, Fla. -- With opening night under a week away, FOX Sports Sun, the regional television home of the Tampa Bay Lightning , is proud to premiere a 30-minute special aimed at providing insight on the Lightning's offseason and goals going into opening night. On Saturday, Oct. 3 at 11:30 p.m., the "Tampa Bay Lightning Preseason Special" will be televised statewide on FOX Sports Sun following coverage of the Orlando City Soccer game. 
"Tampa Bay Lightning Preseason Special" will provide Bolts fans throughout the state with the perfect primer for the 2015-16 season. The team's preparation leading up to the Oct. 8 home opener is spotlighted as host Paul Kennedy is joined by analysts Bobby "The Chief" Taylor and Brian Engblom to discuss the Lightning's chances at reaching the Stanley Cup Playoffs once again. Interviews featured in the show include Lightning Captain Steven Stamkos , Head Coach Jon Cooper and General Manager Steve Yzerman . Additionally, our broadcasters will use 'FOX Vision' technology to break down Tampa Bay's roster and lines heading into the season.Be sure to follow @FOXSportsBolts on Twitter for live coverage and information on the Lightning, and visit FOXSportsFlorida.com for channel listings and exclusive Bolts coverage.
